title: AGE 360 Building / ARCHITECTS OFFICE + Triptyque
description: AGE 360, the new residential building designed by Greg Bousquet for the developer AG7, transforms the landscape of the Ecoville neighborhood in Curitiba by proposing a landmark of vertical architecture that combines technical innovation, sustainability, and quality of life. Standing at 124 meters tall, the building was conceived to be an urban icon, reflecting the relationship between structural pragmatism and architectural poetics that define AO's designs.
